ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
Fizzyl wrote:
<blockquote TYPE=CITE>From: "Fizzyl" <fizzyl@...>
<p>You get the paw off Vin Moltar if I remember right. I guess we need
to be
<br>looking for more Moltars for the rest of the rings. Could you talk
to Gynok?
<br>The Paw quest seems pretty complex, so hopefully there is a good payoff.
<br> </blockquote>
Ya gota Kill Gynok ... and Well I didn't bother to get the Kashish and
rats ear pie .. I just killed vin ( hey he was flipping me the bird) ;-P,
after i talked to him .. he mentions he's father traveled and  sold
stuff in odus ..
<br> 
<br> 
<br> 
<p>--
<p>Jamie Macdonald
<p>A.K.A
<br>Magis DarkStone

<p>"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."
